articles.title: About
articles.contents:
I realise that I should add some text here. And I will, one by one, as I develop an understanding what this website is about.
What I know now (2020-02-14)
This website is about:
actually using this URL that I have had for nearly 25 years
providing a central place for my online profiles
sharing how I develop R training courses
blogging about my experience working in the water, sanitation and hygiene (WASH) sector
my experience being a dad
sharing my passions

articles.title: Lars Schöbitz
articles.contents:
Lars Schöbitz

            I am an environmental engineer at heart and trade. My passion for it brought me to research within the global water, sanitation and health (WASH) sector. In 2016 I was introduced to R, which renewed my fascination for using programming to solve problems. I am driven by the unique opportunity to bring his two worlds together by teaching Data Science R using the values and principles at the core of its community.
          
        
      
    

    
      
        
          
            
              
            
              Lars Schöbitz

              I am an environmental engineer at heart and trade. My passion for it brought me to research within the global water, sanitation and health (WASH) sector. In 2016 I was introduced to R, which renewed my fascination for using programming to solve problems. I am driven by the unique opportunity to bring his two worlds together by teaching Data Science R using the values and principles at the core of its community.
